ACT
173. 
Certificate of recipient of compulsory portion
A notary shall authenticate a certificate concerning the claim arising from a compulsory portion (hereinafter certificate of recipient of compulsory portion) on the basis of a notarially authenticated application of the successor, the executor of the will or the person entitled to a compulsory portion.
The certificate of recipient of compulsory portion shall set out the recipient and the size of the compulsory portion as a legal share of the estate.
